# didRejectPlayer(_:reason:)

**Instance Method**

A player that tried to join was rejected or a player that previously joined our game was ejected.

## Declaration

```swift
func didRejectPlayer(_ playerID: PlayerIdentifier, reason: any Error)
```

## Handling errors

- **multiplayerSessionFailed(reason:)**: We failed to start or join a new multiplayer session or had to terminate a previously started multiplayer session.

items.description: We failed to start or join a new multiplayer session or had to terminate a previously started multiplayer session.
